metadata.title: CVE-2015-3192 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Pivotal Spring Framework before 3.2.14 and 4.x before 4.1.7 do not properlyprocess inline DTD declarations when DTD is not entirely disabled, whichallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumptionand out-of-memory errors) via a crafted XML file.

criterions.comment: libspring-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
